oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee State Fairgrounds harness race track and midway, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the Tennessee State Fairgrounds, featuring the harness racing track and midway, not dated. Harness racing took place from the 1890s to the 1950s at this venue. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Fairgrounds (Nashville, Tenn.)
